query:

ADD COLUMN dotloopUserId VARCHAR(64) AFTER openId,
ADD INDEX dotloopUserId_unique (dotloopUserId),
MODIFY COLUMN openId VARCHAR(64) NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN loginMethod VARCHAR(64) DEFAULT 'dotloop';
